column2: Princeton University does not consider student comment information provided to be official University course evaluation data; it does not take that information into consideration in approving courses for permanent status; and it does not take the information into consideration in making tenure or promotion decisions.

column3: What advice would you give to another student considering taking this course?

column1: Mirko is incredibly knowledgeable, and brings a unique point of view to the subject. He is incredibly generous with his time and really dives deep to uncover the subject at hand.
take Mirkos class, he is a passionate educator and will spark your interest in what ever topic you are interest in.
I think that this course is fun if you are looking for an extra course. I wouldn't compare it to the other theory seminars that are offered at the SoA which are far more rigorous.
Take it! Provides a very useful set of tools for understanding the built world (sociological, curatorial, and historical). Excellent professor!
If you have the opportunity, take a class with Mirko.
